title: Kylie Jenner and Stassi recreate Madonna and Britney Spears kiss for Halloween
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Kylie Jenner and her best friend Stassi have set the bar with their Halloween costumes this year, with the pair recreating Britney Spears and Madonna’s iconic kiss.

The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star transformed into Madonna on Saturday night, wearing the queen of pop’s all-black outfit from the MTV Video Music Awards in 2003.

Kylie, 22, donned a blonde wig which was scraped back into a low bun and wore a black top with cut-outs on the shoulders with black jeans, similar to Madonna’s outfit.

Stassi, full name Anastasia Karanikolaou, became her Britney for the night and wore the white mini dress much like the one worn by the popstar 16 years ago.

Advertisement

Advertisement

How has it been that long?

In an Instagram story video, the besties reenacted the moment that made Britney and Madonna’s VMAs performance iconic, by sharing a kiss like the popstars did on-stage while performing Like A Virgin and Hollywood.

If that’s Kylie’s first outfit of the Halloween season, there’s no telling what she’ll pull off next.

The iconic moment (Picture: Kylie Jenner, Instagram)

Kylie and Stassi had their Britney and Madonna moves down (Picture: Kylie Jenner, Instagram)

It was a tequila kind of night (Picture: Kylie Jenner, Instagram)

It had been a wild night for Kylie, who earlier partied with Sofia Richie at a concert.

The cosmetics mogul downed tequila straight from the bottle and swigged Red Bull, so it’s no wonder her energy levels were high. At one point, Kylie turned on a shower to pose for an Instagram snap before hanging out with The Voice star will.i.am backstage.

The pair got on like a house on fire and Kylie cheekily pinched his futuristic glasses which glowed, before later posing for photos with latin singer J Balvin.

Joining Kylie for the night was her mother Kris Jenner’s boyfriend Corey Gamble, who tried to get down with the kids and showed off his dad dancing skills while watching the show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

After a long night, Kylie and Sofia passed out in the car and fell asleep with their heads resting on each other.

description: Kylie Jenner and her best friend Stassi dressed up as Madonna and Britney Spears for Halloween and recreated their iconic kiss.
